metadata.title: CVE-2018-19215 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - negligible.
metadata.description: Netwide Assembler (NASM) 2.14rc16 has a heap-based buffer over-read in expand_mmac_params in asm/preproc.c for the special cases of the % and $ and ! characters.

criterions.comment: nasm package in impish is affected and needs fixing.
